a game played on a special playing area by two teams of two players who hit a small hard ball against a wall with their hand, a wooden bat, or a racket : Uruguayans have a world-class pelota team. On Sundays and fiestas, traditional games of pelota are played in the narrow streets near Altea's church square. Compare
